data.title: food
data.text: Food is good but dont like how everything is al carte meaking you pay for your steak and its dosent come with the side dishes you have to pay extra for them

data.title: Birthday Dinner
data.text: We eat here every year for either my birthday or my husbands.  They give a birthday credit.  The chicken is my go to dinner, grilled breast with pineapple, and the fried mushrooms are terrific, also they have a great house salad dressing.  Staff is always unpredictable (sometimes great, sometimes not at all). I think this may be because the tip is already added to your ticket when you go there for your birthday.  Overall the place could use an update, and better training for servers but the food is good.

data.title: Good but not great steakhouse
data.text: Convenient location,  rowdy and noisy atmosphere, good but not great steaks and accompaniments (the food at the competitor, Longhorn, outshines the Texas Cattle Company, as does local rival, The Cattlemen). Kids will like this place, and there were quite a few families there on a weekday evening, but it may be too raucous for most adult-only dining parties. And if you have a peanut allergy, be warned -- they serve peanuts in the shell, and the shells and remains as thrown on the floor like at the burger place, Five Guys.

data.title: Remarkable Steaks
data.text: Thoroughly enjoyed our dinner. Our party enjoyed a Porterhouse, a Filet Mignon, and the Birthday T-Bone. All were cooked to perfection. Service was exemplary with efficiency, knowledgeable and quick responses.   Certainly will return...even if it's not a Birthday.

owner_response.author: deidre w, Operating Partner at Texas Cattle Company, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Sharon,  I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your recent dinner with us.  We appreciate you sharing your experience with others.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Same good standard
data.text:
Sunday evening meal with friends. Friendly efficient service as usual.
Starters were good. Salads also good. Bread not so good as before - possibly different? Steak was well cooked as ordered and very tasty. One large dessert was ok from the one bite I had. All good reports from the other diners in our party.
Large portions but not offered any vegetable on ordering apart from the included side?
Always far too much so doggy bags large - no complaints about that. 
Not cheap to eat here but quality and service above average.

data.title: Looking for nice sit down restaurant.
data.text: If you are looking for a good steak restaurant this is it.  The steak was cooked just as asked and the flavor was great.  Bake potato was fixed by the waiter to our liking. Dessert was large.

data.title: Favorite place for our birthdays!
data.text: This great steak restaurant has been a favorite of our for years.  With their birthday special, we like to get the BOGO special and enjoy what has always been a fabulous steak dinner.  They work hard to be sure you are pleased with your dinner, having you slice into your steak while they wait to make sure its to your liking. But beyond the great steak is the fabulous house salad that is AYCE, unique bread and options of incredible looking and tasting desserts.  They bring around a tray and describe each option to the yummiest of details.  But don't think its just steak they do well - the pork chops and chicken on their menu are also fabulous. Also ask about their wine specials.  For us, its a bit pricey to go very often but we do love it and know its at least our special birthday treat.  They open at 4pm and reservations are recommended -- it is a very popular place.

data.title: Yum!
data.text: Appetizers are great!! Main course wonderful!  Great special occasion place! Dessert is sharable size!

data.title: I've had better
data.text:
This is a combination review from several visits to the Texas Cattle company. Most have been on very busy nights when our group was attending the Lake Mirror Auto show. Service was poor, even allowing for the crowd. The food is cooked on a wood fire and has an excessive smoke taste. 

A year ago we went there in the summer, had a reservation, were seated and sat for 1/2 hour without a server acknowledging that we were there until we finally walked out. The manager could have cared less when we informed him why we were leaving.

data.title: Enjoyed the steak
data.text: Ate here this week. Great steak cooked exactly as requested and nice salad to go with it. Would happily return again another time

data.title: Smelly and Slow
data.text: Upon arrival we were placed in a room with an overwhelming musty odor.  We were moved upon request, as were other customers who were placed in the same room.  We ordered -- the salad took 15 minutes and we finally got our meal after asking twice.  And, it was cold.  To be fair, it was our first visit, based on recommendations from locals.  Our experience may not have been typical, but it was so poor we are unlikely to give it a second chance.

data.title: Great place for special occasion
data.text: Excellent food and service. Best steakhouse in Lakeland. Best house salad on the planet. Free steak on your birthday. Good selection of wines.

owner_response.author: deidre w, Operating Partner at Texas Cattle Company, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Beverly,  Thanks for spreading the word!!  We hope to see you soon.
Sincerely
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Find in the Heart of downtown
data.text: Luckily we got there early as the restaurant began to fill up.  We had the dang bang shrimp appetizer (similar to Bonefish) and it was very good.  They also brought out a basket of bread that was very, very good!!! Both my husband and myself had the filet migon which was excellent.  We were to full to try dessert but they all looked excellent. We will definitely go back the next time we are in Lakeland.

owner_response.author: deidre w, Operating Partner at Texas Cattle Company, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Kristi,
   I was glad to hear you enjoyed your recent dinner with us.  We hope to see you back again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: always good
data.text: Good place to get a good steak with some awesome desserts. Service is friendly and consistent. Steaks are great. Wine selection is good. They can easily handle large parties with advance notice and a reservation.

data.title: Just out for dinner
data.text: Always good, get there early unless you want to wait.  The bar is a nice area in which to wait but the wait can be very long.

data.title: Awesome steaks
data.text: This is a great place for special occasions or a date night! It's a little pricey, but worth it as the food is delicious.

owner_response.author: deidre w, Operating Partner at Texas Cattle Company, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Cindy, just wanted to say thanks for spreading the word!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great
data.text: Lakeland  higher end,Restaurant very nice rustic interior food is good I warn you it is Smokey flavor if you don't like smoke flavoring your steaks this is not the place for you but for the ones that do it's good it's a great place not for a budget price but it's a good value

data.title: Cooked perfectly but poorly seasoned
data.text: Friendly service. Excellent dessert. Steak cooked perfectly. Every dish we ordered, from the steak to the salmon was poorly seasoned though. Overpriced when you consider we would have enjoyed outback or something similar more for half the price.

owner_response.author: deidre w, Operating Partner at Texas Cattle Company, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
I am disappointed to hear you did not enjoy your recent dinner with us, I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to discuss with you.  Please feel free to call me at 863-686-1434 at your earliest convenience.
Thank-you
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great food
data.text: Food was great, love the steak and the pork chops are delicious. The only thing that was bad is that I had a reservation for 7: 00 and had to wait until 7:18 to be seated

owner_response.author: deidre w, operating partner at Texas Cattle Company, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Joe,  Sorry about your wait last night, but I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your dinner with us...next time you join us feel free to give me a call so I can ensure your seating is expedited. 863-686-1434
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: 18th birthday celebration
data.text: The only thing enjoyable under the food was the bread. We had filets, kabobs, boneless ribeyes and they were the worst steak/beef I've ever had. All that was able to be tasted was salt as if it were cured and char. The prices are outrageous. The salads were slimmy with no flavor. What a disappointment. We had family and friends alike and had to apologize to all. Never will return.

owner_response.author: deidre w, operating partner at Texas Cattle Company, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Sherri,  I sincerely apologize that you were disappointed with your recent visit!  I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to discuss in more detail.  If you or anyone in your party could call me at  your earliest convenience at 863-686-1434 so I can address any of the issues you may have had.
Thank-you
owner_response.title: Owner Response
